committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to make the unemployment compensation benefits provided for Federal employees applicable to U.S. citizen employees of the Roosevelt Campobello International Park Commission.

summary.text: Makes the unemployment compensation benefits provided for Federal employees applicable to United States citizen employees of the Roosevelt Campobello International Park Commission. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1106)

titles.title: A bill to make the unemployment compensation benefits provided for Federal employees applicable to U.S. citizen employees of the Roosevelt Campobello International Park Commission.
